name: Kitty and Katy: Ghost Hunt
description:
Play as Katy, a ghost hunter who follows DIRECTIONS(!) from her ghost cat, Kitty! Find items, escape traps, and the evil Catsper!

Programmers: zetachan, Godfrost42,  Chugar

Artists: Ashley_7,laura

List of completed challenges: 

Watches Steve Irwin Once (cat ghost, frog, undead animals count too, right?) 

Look Ma! One Hand! (all controls are on the keyboard) 

Representation Master (main character is a WOC) 

We Love You Too (painting in the third floor in the left room) 

Gotta Love Nostalgia (game decor and colour palette inspired by 70’s aesthetics) 

The Egg Came First (spot the frog!) 

Self-Made Asset-er (all art, music, and programming is self made, sound effects from freesounds.com) 

I’m Han Solo (one main character, Katy)
